briefTitle: Case-Control-Study on the Breast Cancer Risk of Mirena® Compared With Copper IUDs
officialTitle: Case-Control-Study on the Breast Cancer Risk of Mirena® Compared With Copper IUDs
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* cases: women with a breast cancer who are younger than 50 years of age at cancer diagnosis
* controls: women without a breast cancer diagnosis who are younger than 50 years at the time of the interview

Exclusion Criteria:

* women who are not willing to participate
